title: Launcher Links
description: Settings for the launcher links extension.

launchers.title: Custom Launchers
launchers.description: Launcher items appear within each category in the same order as this list. Use the move controls in the settings editor to reorder items.

id.description: Unique identifier suffix for the command (e.g., 'open-google'). Combined with the extension ID.

label.description: Text label for the launcher item and command.

url.description: URL to open when the item is clicked.

icon.description: Name of a LabIcon (e.g., 'ui-components:jupyter') or an SVG string.
